Praise<S>1984</S> ye the LORD<S>3050</S>. Praise<S>1984</S>, O ye servants<S>5650</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>, praise<S>1984</S> the name<S>8034</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>. <sup>Praise ye: Heb. Hallelujah</sup>
Blessed<S>1288</S> be the name<S>8034</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> from this time forth<S>6258</S> and for<S>5704</S> evermore<S>5769</S>.
From the rising<S>4217</S> of the sun<S>8121</S> unto the going down<S>3996</S> of the same the LORD'S<S>3068</S> name<S>8034</S> is to be praised<S>1984</S>.
The LORD<S>3068</S> is high<S>7311</S> above all nations<S>1471</S>, and his glory<S>3519</S> above the heavens<S>8064</S>.
Who is like unto the LORD<S>3068</S> our God<S>430</S>, who dwelleth<S>3427</S> on high<S>1361</S>, <sup>dwelleth: Heb. exalteth himself to dwell</sup>
Who humbleth<S>8213</S> himself to behold<S>7200</S> the things that are in heaven<S>8064</S>, and in the earth<S>776</S>!
He raiseth up<S>6965</S> the poor<S>1800</S> out of the dust<S>6083</S>, and lifteth<S>7311</S> the needy<S>34</S> out of the dunghill<S>830</S>;
That he may set<S>3427</S> him with princes<S>5081</S>, even with the princes<S>5081</S> of his people<S>5971</S>.
He maketh the barren woman<S>6135</S> to keep<S>3427</S> house<S>1004</S>, and to be a joyful<S>8056</S> mother<S>517</S> of children<S>1121</S>. Praise<S>1984</S> ye the LORD<S>3050</S>. <sup>to keep: Heb. to dwell in an house</sup>
